entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
